title: Microsoft updates Xbox app to let users share game content in Snapchat-like Stories
content:
Microsoft announced its latest update to the Xbox app for both iOS and Android. Xbox users in Australia now have new ways to share their favorite gaming content with Snapchat-like stories. They’ll be able to create, share, and view their friend’s stories from within the Xbox app.

more…

The post Microsoft updates Xbox app to let users share game content in Snapchat-like Stories appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Xbox app users in Australia now have new ways to share their favorite gaming content with Snapchat-like stories on both iOS and Android.
